REGISTRATION QUESTIONS?


Registration Advising Guide & Resources




MUST SEE RESOURCES:


Please checkout these helpful resources designed for success during you time at school











GE Advising is available for:
1. Engineering and Computer Science Majors at the 
ECS Student Success Center


2. Natural Science and Mathematics Majors at the 
NSM Student Success Center


3. Communications Majors at the COMM Student Success Center

4. College of The Arts Majors at COTA Student Advising
